Santiago, Apr 14 (IANS): More than 7.4 million people in Chile have been vaccinated against the novel coronavirus disease, the Ministry of Health has said.
The government's goal is to vaccinate 15 million people, or 80 per cent of the population, in the firs…

articles.title: Brazil reports 3,808 single-day COVID-19 deaths - WION
articles.description: Brazil on Tuesday reported 3,808 deaths from COVID-19 in the last 24 hours, raising its pandemic death toll to 358,425.According to the Ministry of Health, during the same period, tests detected 82,186 new COVID-19 cases, bringing the total infections to 13,5…
